LanguageData.BondedWithAnimal.label: phát triển gắn bó
LanguageData.BondedWithAnimal.rulePack.rulesStrings.2: image->[human_nameFull] đang thể hiện sự gắn bó mật thiết với [animal_nameFull] [circumstance_group]
LanguageData.BondedWithAnimal.rulePack.rulesStrings.3: image->[human_nameFull] đang nhận ra [human_possessive] thực sự yêu thương [animal_nameFull] [circumstance_group]
LanguageData.BondedWithAnimal.rulePack.rulesStrings.4: circumstance_phrase->trong khi những vật nuôi khác đang nhìn
LanguageData.BondedWithAnimal.rulePack.rulesStrings.6: circumstance_phrase->với một cảm giác hài lòng
LanguageData.BondedWithAnimal.rulePack.rulesStrings.8: desc_sentence->[animal_nameShortDef] trông như đang nghỉ ngơi và tận hưởng tình yêu thương.
LanguageData.BondedWithAnimal.rulePack.rulesStrings.9: desc_sentence->[animal_nameShortDef] đứng thẳng và nhìn rất quí tộc.
LanguageData.BondedWithAnimal.rulePack.rulesStrings.1: desc_sentence->[animal_nameShortDef] đang phản ứng tích cực.
LanguageData.BecameLover.label: trở thành người yêu
LanguageData.BecameLover.rulePack.rulesStrings.0: tale_noun->[firstPawn_nameShortDef] và [secondPawn_nameShortDef] trở thành người yêu
LanguageData.BecameLover.rulePack.rulesStrings.1: image->[firstPawn_nameFull] đang thì thầm những điều ngọt ngào vô nghĩa vào tai [secondPawn_nameFull] [circumstance_group]
LanguageData.BecameLover.rulePack.rulesStrings.3: image->[firstPawn_nameFull] đang nô đùa trên giường với [secondPawn_nameFull] [circumstance_group]
LanguageData.BecameLover.rulePack.rulesStrings.5: circumstance_phrase->trên một chiếc giường lớn phi thực tế
LanguageData.BecameLover.rulePack.rulesStrings.6: circumstance_phrase->giữa những tấm khăn trải giường
LanguageData.BecameLover.rulePack.rulesStrings.7: circumstance_phrase->với cảnh tượng ít quần áo
LanguageData.BecameLover.rulePack.rulesStrings.8: circumstance_phrase->trong khi cả hai đẫm mồ hôi
LanguageData.BecameLover.rulePack.rulesStrings.12: desc_sentence->[firstPawn_nameShortDef] là phong cách nghệ thuật gắn với [secondPawn_nameShortDef].
LanguageData.BecameLover.rulePack.rulesStrings.13: desc_sentence->[firstPawn_nameShortDef] là một hình ảnh phản chiếu gần của [secondPawn_nameShortDef].
LanguageData.BecameLover.rulePack.rulesStrings.14: desc_sentence->[firstPawn_nameShortDef] đang chạm vào [secondPawn_nameShortDef] một cách thông thạo.
LanguageData.Breakup.label: chia tay
LanguageData.Breakup.rulePack.rulesStrings.1: image->[firstPawn_nameFull] đang ngồi với [secondPawn_nameFull] cho một cuộc nói chuyện khó chịu [circumstance_group]
LanguageData.Breakup.rulePack.rulesStrings.3: image->[firstPawn_nameFull] đang đẩy [secondPawn_nameFull] ra khỏi giường [circumstance_group]
LanguageData.Breakup.rulePack.rulesStrings.4: image->[firstPawn_nameFull] đang từ chối cái ôm từ [secondPawn_nameFull] [circumstance_group]
LanguageData.Breakup.rulePack.rulesStrings.5: circumstance_phrase->trong khoảnh khắc của sự buồn chán cùng cực
LanguageData.Breakup.rulePack.rulesStrings.6: circumstance_phrase->giống như cái nhìn của một người xa lạ
LanguageData.Breakup.rulePack.rulesStrings.8: desc_sentence->[secondPawn_nameShortDef] đang thổn thức không kiểm soát.
LanguageData.Breakup.rulePack.rulesStrings.9: desc_sentence->[secondPawn_nameShortDef] đang giễu cợt và khóc cùng lúc.
LanguageData.Breakup.rulePack.rulesStrings.10: desc_sentence->[secondPawn_nameShortDef] cứng mặt vì choáng váng.
LanguageData.Breakup.rulePack.rulesStrings.11: desc_sentence->[firstPawn_nameShortDef] là phong cách nghệ thuật xa rời với [secondPawn_nameShortDef].
LanguageData.Breakup.rulePack.rulesStrings.12: desc_sentence->[secondPawn_nameShortDef] đã sụp đổ trên sàn nhà trong run rẩy.
LanguageData.Breakup.rulePack.rulesStrings.13: desc_sentence->[secondPawn_nameShortDef] khoa chân múa tay đầy tức giận với [firstPawn_nameShortDef].
LanguageData.Marriage.label: đám cưới
LanguageData.Marriage.rulePack.rulesStrings.2: image->[firstPawn_nameFull] đang nói [firstPawn_possessive] lời thề hôn ước với [secondPawn_nameFull] [circumstance_group]
LanguageData.Marriage.rulePack.rulesStrings.3: image->[firstPawn_nameFull] đang đi xuống hành lang với [secondPawn_nameFull] [circumstance_group]
LanguageData.Marriage.rulePack.rulesStrings.4: image->[firstPawn_nameFull] đang nắm tay [secondPawn_nameFull] trong suốt buổi lễ thành hôn [circumstance_group]
LanguageData.Marriage.rulePack.rulesStrings.5: circumstance_phrase->trong một buổi lễ trang nghiêm
LanguageData.Marriage.rulePack.rulesStrings.6: circumstance_phrase->trong khi cả hai đang cười mãn nguyện
LanguageData.Marriage.rulePack.rulesStrings.7: circumstance_phrase->trong khi những người khác đang nhìn một cách long trọng
LanguageData.Marriage.rulePack.rulesStrings.11: desc_sentence->[firstPawn_nameShortDef] là phong cách nghệ thuật gắn với [secondPawn_nameShortDef].
LanguageData.Marriage.rulePack.rulesStrings.12: desc_sentence->[firstPawn_nameShortDef] là hình ảnh phản chiếu gần của [secondPawn_nameShortDef].
LanguageData.Marriage.rulePack.rulesStrings.13: desc_sentence->[firstPawn_nameShortDef] đang chạm vào [secondPawn_nameShortDef] một cách thông thạo.
